org.sbml.jsbml.util.filters
Class SpeciesReferenceFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.sbml.jsbml.util.filters.NameFilter
      org.sbml.jsbml.util.filters.SpeciesReferenceFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class SpeciesReferenceFilter
extends NameFilter

This is a special NameFilter that allows users to search for a SimpleSpeciesReference that refers to a Species with the given identifier attribute. The boolean switch filterForSpecies that can be changed using the setFilterForSpecies(boolean) method decides whether this SpeciesReferenceFilter should use the given identifier to filter for the actual SimpleSpeciesReference or for the referenced Species.

Since:
0.8
Version:
$Rev: 1357 $
Author:
Andreas Dräger

public boolean accepts(Object o)
Description copied from interface: Filter
This method checks whether the given object is of the correct type and has the desired properties set to be acceptable.

Specified by:
accepts in interface Filter

Parameters:
o - some object whose properties are to be checked.
Returns:
